original: @135b ` // gdams ngag nye bar bsdus pa bzhugs//
analyzed: doms ngag nye ba sdud ba

original: # // 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: phag ba jam dpal ye shes sems dpa la phyag tshal lo

original: chos kun rang bzhin 'jam dpal ye shes sems //
analyzed: chos kun rang bzhin jam dpal ye shes sems

original: ma lus bde gshegs kun gyi mtshan gyur pa //
analyzed: ma lus bde gshegs kun gyi mtshan gyur ba

original: rdo rje 'chang chen rnams kyi glur blangs don //
analyzed: rdo rje chang chen rnams kyi glur blangs don

original: za bcing rgya che'i skye bo blo bzangs don //
analyzed: za ching rgya che skye bo blo bzangs don

original: byang chub sems ldan lhag pa'i lhar mos la //
analyzed: byang chub sems ldan lhag ba lhar mos la

original: sgyu ma'i rten 'brel rnam gsum sbyor ba las //
analyzed: sgyu ma rten brel rnam gsum sbyor ba las

original: ma lus gnyis med mkha' khyab sprul tshogs dgu'o //

original: ma skyes mi 'gag sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshogs //
analyzed: ma skye mi gag sgyu phrul dra ba tshogs

original: rdo rje mig gis snang thob bar du blta //
analyzed: rdo rje mig gis snang thob ba du lta

original: sgyu ma brag nam mkha'i rang bzhin du //
analyzed: sgyu ma brag nam mkha rang bzhin du

original: yongs su shes nas ma zhen sems kyis bklag / gsang sngags tshul chen lam ni 'di yin te //
analyzed: yongs su shes nas ma zhen sems kyis klog gsang sngags tshul chen lam ni di yin te

original: ji ltar dngos rnams mkha' la gnas pa bzhin //

analyzed: dam tshig dkyil khor phyag rgya che la gnas

analyzed: don de mi shes dka ba lam gzhan gyis

analyzed: khor ba grong gsum dag la de mi g-yo

original: 'gro kun sems kyi rang bzhin chos rnams lung //
